system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.aa-rulebook.Item.CbH9UMxgrmEr8tFh]{Personal Plasmas Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.aa-rulebook.Item.I2ulORBcKU6kkakv]{Advanced Plasmas Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.aa-rulebook.Item.26IKWyB4UbvtIVGQ]{Targeted Plasmas Proficiency}

Benefits

The character can perfom gridshot, bounceshot, pulseshot, and focusshot attacks without penalty.

Normal

Characters without this feat take a -6 penalty when attempting a gridshot, bounceshot, pulseshot, or focusshot attack.
system.summary: No gridshot, bounceshot, pulseshot, focusshot penalty
